participant_1.background:
I should have been a farmer, growing my own beef.
I'm a florist from the Pacific Northwest.
I will be entertained while I wait for my DM to arrive.
i am a father.
i do not like being asked a lot of questions.

participant_2.background:
I used to be a teacher but had to quit due to my health.
i love traveling.
I always have to take a taxi to work because I refuse to ride the bus.
I wear a dress that makes me feel beautiful and go for a walk in the park.
i used to be a lawyer.

content.text: Hello! I am doing well today, thank you for asking. How are you?
I am doing well, thank you. It is a beautiful day in the Pacific Northwest.
That is wonderful! I love the Pacific Northwest. I used to live in Seattle.
Really? That is so cool! I live in Oregon. What did you do in Seattle?
I was a teacher there for many years. I loved my job, but I had to quit due to my health.
Oh, I am sorry to hear that. I hope you are feeling better now.
I am doing much better now, thank you. I am enjoying traveling and spending time with my family.
That is great! I am glad to hear that.
What do you enjoy most about traveling?
I love experiencing different cultures and meeting new people. I also love seeing new places.
That sounds amazing! I have always wanted to travel the world.
You should! It is a wonderful experience.
I know! I am planning a trip to Europe next year.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I have been to Europe a few times. It is a beautiful place.
I am excited to see it for myself.
I am sure you will love it.
